snippet.title: Loot & Legends - iOS / Android - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
ADVENTURE! GLORY! PIZZA! 

LOOT & LEGENDS, based on the award winning PC game Card Hunter, is a free-to-play collectible card game that blends deck building, tactical combat and tabletop RPG’s in a way you’ve never seen before. Grab your cards, miniatures, dice and snacks as you join your Game Master, Gary, in a new world of magic, adventure, and conquest!

Fortune and glory are waiting... do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Legend? 

- Bring your skills to the next level! Move your characters through tactical battles to flank enemies and take down bosses.

- Your gear builds your deck! Each piece of armor and weaponry holds a set of cards. Mix and match your favorite equipment to build the ultimate deck!

- Defeat your enemies to unlock new adventures, level up your party, and gain access to increasingly powerful card sets.

- A hilarious and unique journey back to the 80s, filled with pop culture, sibling rivalry, and a love affair with a beautiful, mysterious … pizza delivery girl?

Shuffle your deck, build your team, and live the dream! 

iTunes link: https://itunes.apple.com/ca/app/loot-legends/id935089574?mt=8&uo=4&at=1l3vmto
